title: Chrome (Q-Switched Technology for soft light)
description: Experience cutting-edge laser hair removal with our Chrome technology. This advanced system offers precise, comfortable, and effective hair reduction for all skin types.
items: Multi-Wavelength System: Uses 1064 nm & 532 nm Q-Switched Nd: YAG for diverse treatments.
Skin Rejuvenation:Targets pigmentation, vascular lesions, and fine lines.
Carbon Peel:Enhances skin brightness, texture, and acne control.
Fractional 1064 nm:Improves skin resurfacing and scar treatment.

title: Duetto MT EVO
description: Our Duetto laser system combines two wavelengths for optimal hair removal results, suitable for all skin types and hair colors.
items: Mixed Technology:Combines Alexandrite (755 nm) & Nd:YAG (1064 nm)for diverse hair types.
Targets Vellus Hair *Effectively removes *fine, light, and peach fuzz hair.
Painless Treatment cooling system and reduces discomfort
Fast & Efficient:Large spot sizes ensure quick and effective sessions.

title: GentleMax Pro
description: The GentleMax Pro delivers powerful yet gentle laser hair removal, combining two fast and effective laser technologies for optimal results across all skin types.
items: lDual Wavelength:Alexandrite (755 nm) & Nd:YAG (1064 nm)for all skin types.
Hair Removal:Targets coarse and fine (vellus) hair efficiently.
Pigmentation & Rejuvenation:Treats sun damage, pigmentation, vascular lesions, and skin tightening.
Comfort & Safety :Dynamic Cooling Device (DCD) minimizes discomfort.

title: Specialized Laser Treatments
description: Advanced laser treatments for specific skin concerns and aesthetic enhancement, using state-of-the-art technology for optimal results.

title: Skin Treatments & Pigmentation Correction
description: Comprehensive skin treatments designed to improve skin texture, tone, and overall appearance using advanced laser technology.

title: Tatto & Lesion Removal
description: State-of-the-art laser technology for safe and effective removal of tattoos and various pigmented lesions, utilizing precise wavelengths to target different ink colors and skin conditions.
